Class Deck<Element>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.tableReleted.Deck<Element>
Type Parameters:
Element - the type of the elements in the deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck<Element> extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a deck of elements (cards)
